title: The rehabilitation component shall mean all residential tenements as well as non-residential built u
clause_text: The rehabilitation component shall mean all residential tenements as well as non-residential built up premises given free of cost in accordance with the provisions of the DRP outlined in this Regulation excluding what is set down in Regulation 31(1) including anganwadi, health centre /outpost, community hall /gymnasium / fitness centre, skill development centre, women entrepreneurship centre, yuvakendra
